name: IsatM2M
description: IsatM2M is a global, short burst data, store and forward service that will deliver messages of 10.5 or 25.5 bytes in the send direction, to 100 bytes in the receive direction. It also gives users the ability to broadcast to multiple terminals, increasing the cost and efficiency of managing your fleet

name: IsatData Pro
description: IsatData Pro is a global, packet data, store and forward service that will deliver messages of 6,400 bytes in the send direction and 10,000 bytes in the receive direction. It also gives users the ability to broadcast messages to multiple terminals or groups of terminals, increasing the cost and efficiency of managing your fleet.

name: BGAN M2M
description: BGAN M2M will be a fixed Standard IP service, offering data speeds in excess of 100kbps in both directions. It also has the capability transmit larger data grabs and interact with remote devices on an IP session.

name: BGAN
description:
BGAN

It's here! Inmarsat's next-generation mobile communications service - BGAN (Broadband Global Area Network) - combines broadband data, up to half a megabit per second, and voice telephony in a single, highly portable device providing seamless coverage across all the world's major landmasses. The BGAN service is ideal for a variety of industries and applications including civil engineers, project managers, consultants, researchers and sales staff, anyone, in fact, who wants to communicate at high speed using their familiar desktop computer applications when travelling or working in locations where the local networks are poor or non-existent. BGAN InmarsatBGAN is the world's first mobile communications service to deliver broadband data and voice, simultaneously, through a single, truly portable device, anywhere on the planet. It is the first mobile communications service to offer guaranteed data rates on demand. These unique innovations enable BGAN to extend the boundaries of the broadband mobile office that 3G cellular services are beginning to deliver, positioning it alongside the world's most advanced digital mobile services.

name: ThurayaSo2510
description:
Thuraya SO-2510 handset is powerful and compact, offering total convenience and mobility. Weighing just 130g, the Thuraya SO-2510 is the smallest and lightest satellite handset available.

While compact, the Thuraya SO-2510 is also powerful. It provides the convenience and mobility of uninterrupted border-to-border satellite communication across Thurayaâ€™s coverage area spanning more than 140 countries across Asia, Australia, Africa, the Middle East and Europe.
